ValidationRule.description: This validation Rule check if Rejection Reason is Documents reject or Customer Photo reject and Reject Field is selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(ISNEW()), $Profile.Name = "CMU", INCLUDES( CMU_Rejection_Reason__c, "Documents reject or Customer Photo reject"), NOT(ISBLANK(Rejection_Fields__c)), OR(INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC name'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC No.'), INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Salutation'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Driving Licence'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Last Name'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Gender'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Aadhaar Enrollment Number'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Passport File No'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Passport No'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'PAN No.'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC Expiry Date'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC Issuance Date'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC DOB'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC Address Line 1'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC Address Line 2'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC City'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC District'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC State'), INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'KYC Pin Code'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Father name incorrect'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Mother name incorrect'),INCLUDES( Rejection_Fields__c , 'Spouse name incorrect')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select appropriate rejection Fields for Documents reject or Customer Photo reject.
